title: Context Assembly Blacklist

excluded_schemas.reason: Health check responses - internal system monitoring, not conversational context
Performance metrics - internal telemetry, not relevant to user queries
Tool configuration settings - internal setup, not context for LLM
Secrets and credentials - NEVER include in any context for security
System initialization events - internal lifecycle, not conversational
Schema definitions - metadata about schemas, not actual content
This blacklist itself - configuration metadata, not content
Hygiene runner statistics - internal housekeeping metrics
Agent definitions - internal configuration, not conversational context
Agent catalog - internal system metadata, not user content
Assembled context breadcrumbs - prevents recursive context inclusion
Tool source code - implementation details, not relevant for LLM context
DEPRECATED: Tool catalog aggregation removed. Agents now query tool.code.v1 directly.
Template definitions - system metadata, not user content
Guide templates - system documentation, not conversational context
Bootstrap marker - internal system state, not relevant to queries
Tool requests - internal system communication, not user context
Tool responses - handled via agent subscriptions, don't duplicate in context assembly
OpenRouter models catalog - massive dataset not relevant for agent context
UI state - dashboard form state, not conversational context
UI page layouts - rendering metadata, not conversational content
Page layouts - UI rendering metadata, not chat context
Visual themes - colors/fonts/styling, not relevant to LLM reasoning
UI components - rendering definitions, not conversational
Templates - system metadata for structure, not user content
Base templates - structural guides, not conversational content
Tool templates - structural guides, not conversational content
Agent templates - structural guides, not conversational content

notes: This blacklist prevents metadata from appearing in assembled context
Add schemas here if they're system internals, not user-facing content
Update via: POST /breadcrumbs (creates new version) or PATCH /breadcrumbs/{id}
Context-builder loads this at startup and caches in memory
Restart context-builder after updates to pick up changes

description: Schemas excluded from context assembly to prevent metadata leakage
